Smart Wallet with AI-Powered Financial Management: Create a wallet with an inbuilt AI system that helps users manage their finances, such as tracking expenses, creating budgets, and providing personalized financial advice. The wallet could also have a feature that allows users to set financial goals and receive alerts when they are close to reaching them. Confidence score: 0.8

Biometric Wallet with Enhanced Security: Develop a wallet that uses biometric technology, such as fingerprint or facial recognition, to securely store and manage users' payment information. This would provide an additional layer of security against fraud and theft. Confidence score: 0.9

Blockchain-Based Wallet for Cryptocurrency Management: Create a wallet that leverages blockchain technology to securely store and manage users' cryptocurrency transactions. This would provide a decentralized and secure platform for managing digital assets. Confidence score: 0.9

Environmentally Friendly Wallet Made from Sustainable Materials: Design a wallet made from eco-friendly materials, such as recycled plastic or bamboo, that are durable and long-lasting. This would reduce the amount of waste generated by traditional wallets and promote sustainable practices. Confidence score: 0.8

Smart Wallet with Augmented Reality Payment Capabilities: Develop a wallet with an augmented reality (AR) feature that allows users to make payments by simply waving their phone or tablet over a payment terminal. This would provide a convenient and contactless payment solution for users. Confidence score: 0.9
